location.tooltip: Location to an empty folder where it will sync the Google Drive data to e.g. ~/Documents/Drive.

whitelistHelp.description: Note: If you want to sync only specific folders please make sure to add them on the list above. Please enter the names exactly as they are named in your Drive! It is also possible to add subfolders e.g. Documents/Work/Projects.

whitelist.tooltip: Whitelist folders that will be sycned from Google Drive e.g. Documents, Photos
